attributes.action: Stop the bus shelter been erected in Grange Crescent Gateshead
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The local council in Gateshead pay no attention to their constituents. They have decided to build a bus shleter outside peoples houses when people have asked for it not to be built. 

They are going to build a swimming pool around the corner but won't build it around there. Will the right honerable prime minster ask why the councillors won't listen!

rejection.details: You should first try to appeal under existing planning law procedures, please see http://www.planningportal.gov.uk/england/genpub/en/1068129756664.html for more details.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
